items.sentence: Mary is the most beautiful girl I\'ve ever met.
Mary isn\'t as beautiful as her younger sister.
Tom always seems to be doing something illegal.
Tom always seems to be unhappy about something.
Tom and Mary are having lunch in the cafeteria.
I wish I had a little more time to finish this.
I wish I had known about this when I was a kid.
I wish I had someone to tell all my secrets to.
I wonder what Tom\'s motive for doing that was.
It\'s been three weeks since Tom broke his arm.
